description: This source file defines a React functional component named ConnectButton which provides a user interface for connecting and disconnecting a service or account. It manages loading state during asynchronous connect/disconnect operations and renders a stylized button accordingly.

methods.name: ConnectButton
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a button for connecting or disconnecting based on the connected state.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: An asynchronous event handler that toggles connection state by invoking provided callbacks and manages loading state.
